channel.title: Rene Kärkkäinen’s Projects
channel.description: Finnish technology student at Business College Helsinki, with a background at WithSecure, a leading Nordic cybersecurity company. Skilled in networking, server environments, cybersecurity, web development, and data analysis. Actively seeking opportunities in IT from all over the world to contribute in enhancing system security.

item.title: Welcome to my home lab!
item.description: Here, servers do their thing, code gets a bit wild, and it's a mix of organized chaos.

item.title: FPS Multiplayer game in Unreal Engine 4
item.description: FPS multiplayer game with Unreal Engine 4 that aims to emulate the experience of the renowned CS:GO.

item.title: Open-Source Wonders
item.description: Exploring programming languages and software development
